jcr:content.seoDescription: Discover the advanced design and technology behind Logitech G gaming mice, keyboards, headsets, and other gear.
jcr:content.seoPageTitle: Logitech G Technology Innovation in Gaming Gear

copy_block.description: Logitech G is intently focused on pushing gaming gear to the limits of what’s possible. Through innovation, we provide players the gear they need to optimize the gaming experience—from competitive esports to casual, immersive fun.
copy_block.title: Leaders in Design and Technology

copyblock.mainDescription: Our latest and most accurate gaming sensor has the fastest frame-processing yet while being 10 times more power efficient.

copyblock.altText: An assortment of Logitech G products using Lightspeed
copyblock.mainDescription: A breakthrough in wireless gaming that solves the issues of latency, stability and connectivity for wired-like performance.
Full-spectrum LIGHTSYNC technology immerses your rig even further into the game with customizable RGB lighting effects driven by games, music and more.
Advanced gaming software, now with sharable and downloadable profiles. Synchronize and customize all your gear for optimal gameplay.

copyblock.altText: Zoomed view of GX Blue "clicky" switch
copyblock.mainDescription: Select from faster, brighter, quieter Romer-G switches in original Tactile and Linear options. Or, choose the iconic, classic “clicky” switch: GX Blue.
Hear enemies with DTS 7.1 surround that locates sounds in your game in 3D. Add Pro-G driver audio quality for even more precision.
Innovation in gameplay precision requires the gaming gear to match. Logitech G partners with the greatest game creators to innovate the most immersive experiences.
